short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you know how much time you spend on individual websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: timeTrackr will track how long you spend on individual domains by observing the active tab. Click the Popup Icon to view how long you have spent on that particular domain, or click the Dashboard button to see the websites you have spent the most time on.
